bits

Class BooleanVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • bits.BooleanVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBooleanVariable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>

    public class BooleanVariable
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBooleanVariable
    A class which represents a Boolean variable. BooleanVariable is essentially a named boolean variable. NOTE: Alternative implementations of BooleanVariable must not only implement IBooleanVariable, but must also ensure that any two instances of BooleanVariable are equal if and only if they have the same name.
    Since:
    2004/08/26
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kerry Michael Soileau

    email: ksoileau2@yahoo.com

    website: http://kerrysoileau.com/index.html
